name: Common Order
description: The ORC segment is used to transmit fields that are common to all orders.

fields.name: Order Control
fields.description: Determines the function of the order segment (NW=New, CA=Cancel, SC=Status Changed, etc.).

fields.name: Placer Order Number
fields.description: The order number assigned by the placing application.

fields.name: Filler Order Number
fields.description: The order number assigned by the filling application (usually the lab or ancillary system). MY CHange!!!

fields.name: Placer Group Number
fields.description: Used to group multiple orders into a single requisition.

fields.name: Order Status
fields.description: Status of the order (A=Some but not all results, CA=Cancelled, CM=Completed, etc.).

fields.name: Response Flag
fields.description: Allows the placer to control the amount of information returned.

fields.name: Quantity/Timing
fields.description: Quantity, interval, duration, and priority of a service (deprecated, use TQ1/TQ2).

fields.name: Parent Order
fields.description: Relates a child order to its parent order.

fields.name: Date/Time of Transaction
fields.description: Date and time of the event that initiated the order.

fields.name: Entered By
fields.description: Identity of the person who actually keyed the request into the application.

fields.name: Verified By
fields.description: Identity of the person who verified the order.

fields.name: Ordering Provider
fields.description: Identity of the person who is responsible for creating the request.

fields.name: Enterer's Location
fields.description: Location of the person who entered the order.

fields.name: Call Back Phone Number
fields.description: Phone number to call for clarification of the order.

fields.name: Order Effective Date/Time
fields.description: Date and time the order becomes effective.

fields.name: Order Control Code Reason
fields.description: Explanation of the reason for the order event.

fields.name: Entering Organization
fields.description: Organization that the enterer belonged to at the time of the order.

fields.name: Entering Device
fields.description: The device used for entering the order (terminal, PC, etc.).

fields.name: Action By
fields.description: Identity of the person who initiated the order event.

fields.name: Advanced Beneficiary Notice Code
fields.description: Indicates the status of the ABN for the order.

fields.name: Ordering Facility Name
fields.description: Name of the facility that placed the order.

fields.name: Ordering Facility Address
fields.description: Address of the ordering facility.

fields.name: Ordering Facility Phone Number
fields.description: Phone number at the ordering facility.

fields.name: Ordering Provider Address
fields.description: Address of the ordering provider.

fields.name: Order Status Modifier
fields.description: Additional information about the status of the order.
